claim: The combined score of the posts edited by Yevgeny is 0, and there is no website URL associated with this user.
extra_info: "Yevgeny" is the DisplayName; edited refers to LastEditorUserId
reasoning: Both assertions in the claim are false. The combined score of posts edited by Yevgeny (LastEditorUserId = 6129) is 34, not 0. Additionally, Yevgeny has a WebsiteUrl of 'http://www.cquotient.com', so the claim that there is no website URL is also incorrect.

content.text: I'll verify this claim step by step.

content.content:
CREATE TABLE users
(
    Id              INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    Reputation      INTEGER          null,
    CreationDate    DATETIME     null,
    DisplayName     TEXT null,
    LastAccessDate  DATETIME     null,
    WebsiteUrl      TEXT null,
    Location        TEXT null,
    AboutMe         TEXT     null,
    Views           INTEGER          null,
    UpVotes         INTEGER          null,
    DownVotes       INTEGER          null,
    AccountId       INTEGER          null,
    Age             INTEGER          null,
    ProfileImageUrl TEXT null
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE posts
(
    Id                    INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    PostTypeId            INTEGER          null,
    AcceptedAnswerId      INTEGER          null,
    CreaionDate           DATETIME     null,
    Score                 INTEGER          null,
    ViewCount             INTEGER          null,
    Body                  TEXT     null,
    OwnerUserId           INTEGER          null,
    LasActivityDate       DATETIME     null,
    Title                 TEXT null,
    Tags                  TEXT null,
    AnswerCount           INTEGER          null,
    CommentCount          INTEGER          null,
    FavoriteCount         INTEGER          null,
    LastEditorUserId      INTEGER          null,
    LastEditDate          DATETIME     null,
    CommunityOwnedDate    DATETIME    null,
    ParentId              INTEGER          null,
    ClosedDate            DATETIME     null,
    OwnerDisplayName      TEXT null,
    LastEditorDisplayName TEXT null,
        foreign key (LastEditorUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (OwnerUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (ParentId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/codebase_community.sqlite" "SELECT Id, DisplayName, WebsiteUrl FROM users WHERE DisplayName = 'Yevgeny';"

content.text: Interesting — Yevgeny has a WebsiteUrl of `http://www.cquotient.com`, not NULL. Let me also check the combined score of posts edited by Yevgeny.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/codebase_community.sqlite" "SELECT SUM(p.Score) FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.LastEditorUserId = u.Id WHERE u.DisplayName = 'Yevgeny';"
input.description: Get combined score of posts edited by Yevgeny

content.text:
Both parts of the claim are contradicted by the data:

1. **Combined score of posts edited by Yevgeny**: The claim says 0, but the actual sum is **34**.
2. **No website URL**: The claim says there's no website URL, but Yevgeny's WebsiteUrl is **http://www.cquotient.com**.

